roleplaying

Class Character

  • java.lang.Object
    • roleplaying.Character

  • public class Character
extends java.lang.Object
    This class contains all the operations that a character should support. A character is an entity in the game that plays a duel against an opponent (another object of character type). The character can possess gears to enhance its abilities to win the battle.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Character

        public Character(HitPoint charHP,
                 CharacterType charType,
                 java.lang.String charName,
                 java.util.ArrayList<Gear> gearList)
        This constructor is used to instantiate a character object that will be used in the game. We cam also pass directlt the gears that this character can equip.
        Parameters:
        charHP - the hit points of the character
        charType - the type of character
        charName - the name of the character
        gearList - the list of gears the character can equip

      • addGearToChar

        public void addGearToChar(Gear gearObj)
                   throws java.lang.Exception
        This method is used to add gear to the character. It checks if the gear addition follows the logic of combining with same gear type and can't be combined more than once.
        Parameters:
        gearObj - the gear object that needs to be added to the character's gear guild
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - when more than 5 gears were tried to be equipped
        java.lang.Exception

      • replaceGear

        public void replaceGear(Gear gearObj,
                        int gearIndex)
                 throws java.lang.Exception
        This method is used to replace a gear from the character's equipped gear list with a combined gear.
        Parameters:
        gearIndex - the index in the list where the gear needs to be combined and replaced
        gearObj - the gear object that needs to be combined with the existing gear
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • equipGears

        public void equipGears(java.util.ArrayList<Gear> givenGearList)
                throws java.lang.Exception
        This method is used by the character to equip gears from a list of 10 gears. It takes the list of gears and sorts it based on the gear type and inside the type sorts it based on the decreasing order of attack points.
        Parameters:
        givenGearList - the gear list from which the character has to choose suitable gears
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - when the gears can't be combined

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        This method is used to print the summary of the character.
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object
        Returns:
        the string containing the summary of the character
